I am a Professor of Theoretical Computer Science.  I have 23 years of teaching experience. My research interest includes Graph Theory & Graph Algorithms; currently teaching Graph Theory.
Candidates with good academic record, dedication and passion for research in graph theory shall contact me for PhD registration (Anna University).
